tasks.label: install-and-verify
tasks.command:
set -e
npm ci || npm install
npm run clean || true
npm run typecheck || true
npm run lint || true
npm run build

tasks.label: build-and-tests
tasks.command:
set -e
npm run build
npm run test:unit
npx playwright install --with-deps || true
npm run test:e2e || npx playwright test

tasks.label: Build and test (unit + e2e)
tasks.command:
set -e
npm run build
npm run test:unit
npx playwright install --with-deps || true
npm run test:e2e || npx playwright test
